snippet.title: Pilgrims Official Trailer (2019)
snippet.description:
Now available as a free-to-start download in the App Store & Google Play!
🍎 https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pilgrims/id1636850850
🤖 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.amanita_design.pilgrims

Buy for PC/Mac/Linux: https://amanita-design.net/games/pilgrims.html
Steam http://bit.ly/PilgrimsSteam
itch.io https://amanitadesign.itch.io/pilgrims
GOG https://www.gog.com/game/pilgrims

Pilgrims is a playful adventure game, created by the team behind Machinarium and Samorost. Roam the land as you please and make new friends, share a laugh with your fellow travelers and help them complete their little stories, your way. How many different solutions can you find?
